sentences.english: LASIK eye surgery poses particular risks for some people.
sentences.chinese: 对有些人来说LASIK眼科手术有特殊的风险。

sentences.english: I'm confused. Should I go to an optometrist or ophthalmologist for my eye exam?
sentences.chinese: 我应该看验光师还是眼科医师，作眼镜查抄时？

sentences.english: Her father, Joel, is an ophthalmologist.
sentences.chinese: 父亲约耳是位眼科医师。
这项发明革命性地推动了眼科学的发展。

sentences.english: Compound anisodine injection clinical application in ophthalmology, quite a number of reports.
sentences.chinese: 复方樟柳碱注射液在眼科的临床应用已有不少报道。

sentences.english: He also serves as a spokesman for the American Academy of Ophthalmology.
sentences.chinese: 他同时还担任美国眼科学会的发言人。

sentences.english: Ophthalmologist-Tested Formula is tear-free and easy on eyes.
sentences.chinese: 眼科医生测试证明本配方无泪，并且对眼睛没有刺激。

sentences.english: On that Friday I had an eye doctor appointment.
sentences.chinese: 那个周五我和眼科医生有预约。

sentences.english: Corneal epithelial injury is one of the most common keratopathy in external ophthalmopathy.
sentences.chinese: 角膜上皮损伤疾病是眼科门诊最常见的角膜病变之一。

sentences.english: Thus, ophthalmologists ' knowledge renewal will be a critical point in the development of the discipline.
sentences.chinese: 因而，眼科医师的知识更新将成为学科发展的关键。

sentences.english: Eye Hospital, Shandong People's Armed Police Corps is currently Distinguished experts.
sentences.chinese: 现任武警山东总队医院眼科特聘专家。

sentences.english: This patient, who could barely keep her eyelids open, was diagnosed by her eye doctor.
sentences.chinese: 图上眼科医生诊断的这位病人，几乎不能把眼皮睁开。

sentences.english: Objective Of cyclosporine A in the eye of the application for clinical reference.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨环孢霉素A在眼科中的应用，以供临床参考。

sentences.english: Afterwards, she decided to be a volunteer nurse on the flying eye hospital.
sentences.chinese: 然后，她决定成为空中眼科医院上一名志愿者护士。

sentences.english: This is the website of The Netherlands Ophthalmic Research Institute (IOI/NORI).
sentences.chinese: 这是荷兰眼科研究所的网站。

sentences.english: An optician is qualified to examine your eyes and prescribe glasses.
sentences.chinese: 眼科医生有资格来检查你的眼睛并给你配眼镜。
